body.name: ZIKEE Gel Seat Cushion with Enhanced Support & Breathability, Extra Large Office Chair Cushion, Sciatica & Back Tailbone Pain Relief, TPE Memory Foam Cushion for Office Chair, Car Seat, Airplane

features: New Generation Seat Cushion: This TPE gel seat cushion is designed with an innovative technology, combined 100% memory foam with a cool honeycomb TPE gel layer on the top. The desk chair cushion provides extra breathability and enhanced support compared to normal TPE seat cushions or traditional memory foam cushions on the market.

Long-sitting without Stuffiness: Long sitting with stuffiness can easily lead to potential health issues such as skin irritation and hemorrhoids. The cooling gel cushion adopts ventilated honeycomb TPE gel matching with breathable and soft fabric to reduce heat buildup and keep your lower body fresh and cool even after prolonged sitting. The desk chair cushion is a simple and effective solution for long-sitting problems.

Lower Body Pressure Relief & Supportive Designs: This office chair seat cushion with the ergonomic U-shape and slope design helps relieve lower back pain, tailbone pressure and promotes blood circulation of thighs. The tailbone pain relief cushion is crafted for long-sitting discomfort relief and promotes a healthy sitting posture.

Enlarged Size & Multi-use to Optimize Various Chairs: Based on Body Mass Index, the size of this pressure relief seat cushion is upgraded to 18 * 16 inches surpassing the regular office seat cushions in 16*16 inches, especially suitable for overweight users with a wider support area. The enlarged memory foam chair cushion can optimize various seats for sitting comfort, such as office chairs, gaming chairs, wheelchairs, dining chairs, and so on.

Anti-slip & Easy to Clean: The gel seat cushion for long sitting with an anti-slip bottom provides sitting stability and minimizes the hassle of adjustments. The quality removable mesh cover makes cleaning easy and simple, achieving sitting comfortably and hygienically.

Premium Customer Service: ZIKEE provides you with a hassle-free shopping experience. We address any questions or concerns for you anytime. If the ergonomic chair cushion has quality problems in 24 months, we promise you a hassle-free return. Get assured to start your comfortable sitting experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works for my truck seat.
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my truck seat, since I'm short as heck. I can reach the pedals and everything just fine, but I hate feeling like I can't see over the dash and hood of the truck. I wish these came standard in all trucks. This cushion is thick, but it isn't hard or anything. It's supportive and soft, great to sit on, but it also keeps me sitting up high enough that I can see a lot better over the dash. Since the truck is critical to keeping our business going, it's really important that I be able to drive it in instances that my husband can't.I feel a lot safer with this cushion. It is a bit wide, so I'm not sure how well it will fit into buckets seats on smaller sized cars. It doesn't 'sit' down into my Mini Cooper's seat, but it fits well enough in the seat of my SUV and the Ram, with its bench seat. It's helpful for my son to use as well, and he's about 5'10". He can see fine, but he feels safer and better about moving the truck around our driveway to hook to the trailer while sitting on this.For the added feeling of safety that I get, this is great. Plus it's supportive and soft at the same time. Can't beat the feel of it verses the stock seats in the Dodge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A bit too firm
reviews.reviewText: I got this for support at work after spine surgery. It seems to be very good quality. But it is VERY firm, pretty much no give to it at all! So I wont be able to use it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thick oversize cushion!
reviews.reviewText: This is a very thick and oversize cushion. This is advertised as a gel cushion, but it feels very hard. The seat cover has a weblike plastic weaving that is not soft or comforable. It felt scratchy on your skin. I covered my cushion with a soft towel. I gave it four stars because It is very well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This ZIKEE Gel Seat TPE Memory Foam Cushion is an excellent addition to my office chair at work
reviews.reviewText: This ZIKEE Gel Seat TPE Memory Foam Cushion is an excellent addition to my office chair at work. It really increases my comfort while sitting and I think also improves my posture. The memory foam cushion happily molds itself to my personal shape, and I greatly prefer it to the underlying chair cushion. It is tall though, so the chair height had to be lowered to keep an appropriate height for sitting. The cushion fabric seems like a good choice, breathable on the top where one sits but with more rubbery feel on the bottom to help keep it in place on the seat without sliding. And its larger size is a big plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cradles the Buttocks!
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't a users of the chair cushions - then I tried one while WFH. My desk chair was not the best and I needed something while I spent 8 hours a day sitting in it. A co-worker suggested a tailbone cushion. I've been a convert ever since that first one. After several years of consistent use, it was time to replace that beloved cushion. Enter Zikee! This one is great! I love that the cover zips off and can be washed. The tapered front edge throws my legs into a natural slope. Don't let the 3" height throw you off. Even the tiniest of hineys on it compress down to a very comfy size. The cover is well made and doesn't slide around on my mesh chair. I'm using it right now and my backside isn't touching the mesh chair anywhere. It does it's job comfortably and reliably. I've already told my co-workers and sisters about it. Great cushion Zikee and I'd give this to anyone that I feel is close enough to get a butt cushion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thick, But Doesn't Do The Trick
reviews.reviewText: I tried to like this thick, heavy cushion, but it has two major drawbacks which affect its rating. Maybe three if you include the $30 cost of entry, too.If you read the description, it's supposed to be good for airplane and car use, i.e. travel. So where's the little loop handle that practically all of these "portable" cushions have for carrying? None here. Not very handy, I'd say.I ordered it for a permanent job on my office chair, so the travel handle isn't an issue. But I don't always wear long pants around the house, and its cover fabric is coarse and rough on skin. I've never encountered any pillow-like device with this kind of scratchy material. A real bummer.Thick enough that I lowered my chair for use. Not the feature set I expect for $30.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just received but very comfy
reviews.reviewText: I cannot speak to how well it will hold up over time, but within seconds my back felt better. It's a little soft but in a good way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Seat Cushion!
reviews.reviewText: I have an office chair that isn't so nice to my bottom anymore, this cushion fixed that. I'm a pretty big guy, and I can spend a lot of time in my office chair. This cushion is making it much more comfortable for me. It appears to have pretty good stitching in the seams, but only time will tell if it can handle my weight for an extended period of time. But right now, I'm very pleased with this cushion.
